newsitem.title: USA: DecisionOne to acquire Memorex Telex unit.
newsitem.headline: DecisionOne to acquire Memorex Telex unit.

text.p: DecisionOne Holdings Corp said Friday it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire the assets of U.S. service division of Memorex Telex Corp for about $30 million.
Memorex Telex, which is based in Irving, Texas, and three of its affiliates filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in mid-October. It had previously filed for such proection in 1992 and 1994.
The cash transaction also will include assuming certain liabilities related to customer maintenace contracts, DecisionOne said. It also must be approved by regulators.
Memorex Telex's U.S. service operation generates more than $100 million in annual revenues and provides service from 106 locations.
"Because of the close overlap in our core businesses and in our target markets, we have been pursuing Memorex Telex for more than a year," DecisionOne Chief Executive Ken Draeger said in a statement.
DecisionOne provides multivendor computer maintenance and technology support services in North America.
